snippet: “Cocktail Culture: The Glamorous Gold Coast Years From Prohibition to 1960,” at the Coe Hall mansion, highlights the fashions and other accoutrements of the decades “when the house was in its heyday.”
abstract: Exhibit Cocktail Culture: The Glamorous Gold Coast Years From Prohibition to 1960, at the Coe Hall mansion in Oyster Bay, highlights the fashions and other accoutrements of the decades when the Coe house was in its heyday (Metropolitan/Long Island).
